scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary holding the Christ Child, standing on a crescent moon. She is dressed in a blue robe and has a golden halo. The Christ Child, naked, is held in her left arm. To the left, an angel with red wings kneels, holding a flame-like object. The background is divided into a blue sky with golden stars and a pink oval shape with golden wavy lines, suggesting a divine or celestial setting. The entire composition is framed by a decorative border.
scene_interpretation: The Virgin Mary and Christ Child on the crescent moon is a common iconographic representation of the Immaculate Conception or the Woman of the Apocalypse (Revelation 12:1). The angel may represent a messenger or a worshipper.
